org.apache.flink.runtime.checkpoint

类 RoundRobinOperatorStateRepartitioner

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.checkpoint.RoundRobinOperatorStateRepartitioner
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    OperatorStateRepartitioner

    public class RoundRobinOperatorStateRepartitioner
extends java.lang.Object
implements OperatorStateRepartitioner
    Current default implementation of OperatorStateRepartitioner that redistributes state in round robin fashion.

    • 方法详细资料

      • repartitionState

        public java.util.List<java.util.Collection<OperatorStateHandle>> repartitionState(java.util.List<OperatorStateHandle> previousParallelSubtaskStates,
                                                                                  int parallelism)
        指定者:
        repartitionState 在接口中 OperatorStateRepartitioner
        参数:
        previousParallelSubtaskStates - List of state handles to the parallel subtask states of an operator, as they have been checkpointed.
        parallelism - The parallelism that we consider for the state redistribution. Determines the size of the returned list.
        返回:
        List with one entry per parallel subtask. Each subtask receives now one collection of states that build of the new total state for this subtask.

      • groupByStateName

        private RoundRobinOperatorStateRepartitioner.GroupByStateNameResults groupByStateName(java.util.List<OperatorStateHandle> previousParallelSubtaskStates)
        Group by the different named states.

                                                                                         int parallelism)
        Repartition all named states.
